medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced abdominal pain and one episode of vomiting leading up to presentation. Initially, she had a temperature of 101.1Â°F. Triage notes indicated she recently called in for abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic pancreatic cancer, status post pancreaticoduodenectomy, hypertension, type 2 diabetes mellitus, hypercholesterolemia, history of factor V Leiden with two prior lower extremity DVTs, complete heart block status post dual chamber pacemaker placement, sciatica.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had cancer, father had coronary artery disease, three sisters with different types of cancer including bilateral breast cancer, brother died of coronary artery disease.
